## AnchorOptions interface

Common options for anchors.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AnchorOptions extends Record<string, any> 
```
<b>Extends:</b> Record&lt;string, any&gt;

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [cssClass?](./common.anchoroptions.cssclass.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Optional css class that will be applied to any DOM element for an endpoint using this anchor. |
